statements: DELETE FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE timestamp = '2023-10-15' AND location = 'Atlantic Ocean';
DELETE FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE location = 'Pacific Ocean' AND timestamp = '2023-07-20';
DELETE FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE temperature < 10.0 AND location = 'Pacific Ocean'
DELETE FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE location = 'Atlantic Ocean' AND temperature >= 15.5
DELETE FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Temperature > 20 AND Time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Time = '2022-03-15' AND Temperature <= 15;
DELETE FROM Marine_Ecosystem WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Coral Reef';
DELETE FROM ocean_temperature WHERE location = 'Pacific' AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM ocean_temperature WHERE location='Pacific' AND date='2022-10-15';
